articles.description: Bob Saget's second child, Lara, shared an emotional and moving post on her Instagram to celebrate Father's Day for her late dad who sadly had an untimely and shocking death earlier this year.
articles.content:
Lara Saget posted a loving Father's Day tribute on her Instagram earlier Sunday in honor of her late dad. 
The Full House alum had three daughters with his first wife, Sherri Kramer, Aubrey, Lara, a… [+2780 chars]
